r.n: - fixes gh#19: Hung apaches on pthread wrlocks - fixes gh#188: Fix Segfault in ZTS build when locking (Tyson Andre) - fixes gh#194: apcu_entry ttl not working - fixes gh#189: SegFault in apc_copy_zval - fixes gh#185: zend_mm_heap corrupted - fixes gh#190: memory leak/failed check for duplicates
